summary: Replaces Lydias appearence, her fighting style and her Class.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#999999][b][font=Arial][size=6]L   Y   D   I   A[/size][/font][/b]
_________________________________________________________________________


[size=5]LANGUAGE:[/size][/color][size=5] [/size][b][size=5][font=Georgia][color=#999999]English[/color][/font][/size][/b]
[b][size=5]
[/size][/b][b][color=#b6b6b6][size=3]NEWEST VERSION: 1.01[/size]

[size=4]One version to just change her look, is avalable aswell![/size]
[/color][/b][color=#666666]
_________________________________________________________________________[/color]


[u][b][color=#999999][font=Arial][size=5]1. DESCRIPTION[/size][/font][/color][/b][/u]

Hail Dragonborn,

thanks for finding my mod, so i can present you my version of Housecarl Lydia. 

She is an eyecandy natural beauty with the same stats like the original Lydia,
besides some minor alterations which i found interesting to have. But first off all
i wanted to change her look. Another aim was to stay as lorefriendly as this mod
can be, which means that she won 't be overpowerd and should fit into the world
of Skyrim. This again means, that she can 't look like any anime-style-charakter
which would hurt my and maybe your eyes too.

This is my first follower-mod and I changed Lydias appearence to a more
apealing one (...to me), so that marriaging her makes more sence ;-)

Her fighting-style is changed to 2-handed and i gave her the ability to cast spells.
Just thought it would be nice to have her fight differnt!

She comes with an orcish armor set, an orcish bow, an enchanted circlet
(heavy-armor-circlet, so u can sell the helmet if u wish)
and a twohanded drauger greatsword.

There are two downloadable versions. Choose one
and uninstall the other if you have it installed.

[color=#666666]
________________________________________________________________________[/color]
[size=5][u][b][color=#999999]
2. NO DLC NEEDED/[/color] ES WIRD KEIN DLC BENÖTIGT[/b][/u][/size]
[color=#6d9eeb][size=4]
[/size][/color]
[color=#666666]_________________________________________________________________________[/color]


[size=5][b][u][color=#999999]3.YOU NEED TO HAVE THE FOLLOWING MODS [/color]/ BENÖTIGTE MODS[/u][/b][/size]

[size=4][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666/?][color=#6d9eeb]Calientes body replacer by [/color][b][color=#6d9eeb]Caliente[/color]
[/b][/url][/size]
[color=#6d9eeb][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal by [b]Hello Santa[/b][/url][b][/b][/size][/color]
[color=#666666]_________________________________________________________________________[/color]


[size=5][u][b][color=#999999]4. ADDITIONAL MODS i AM USING AND ARE USED FOR SCREENSHOTS /
[/color]MODS, DIE ICH FÜR SCREENSHOTS BENUTZTHABE
[/b][/u][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15551/?]
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15551/?]zoners high performance enb[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15551/?] by [b]Shrutesh[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]aMidianBorn Book of Silence by [b]CaBaL- EmeraldReign-the AMB team
[/b][/url]
[color=#666666]_________________________________________________________________________[/color]


[u][b][size=5][color=#999999]5. KNOWN BUGS / [/color]BEKANNTE PROBLEME[/size][/b][/u]

[color=#999999]If you place the esp to early in loadorder, Lydias face can look like vanilla again or 
even strange... So best is to place it to the end or to a very late loading-position.

Load after "feminine femals.esp" if you use the mod, same problem like above.

[/color]Die esp dieser mod bitte möglichst weit am Ende der Ladereihenfolge plazieren, 
da Lydia ansonsten nicht das gewünschte Gesicht haben könnte und grau oder 
merkwürdig aussieht.

Die esp der Mod nach "feminine femals" laden, für den Fall, dass ihr diese Mod benutzt.

[color=#666666]_________________________________________________________________________[/color]


[size=5][b][u][color=#999999]6. FINDING LYDIA [/color]/ WIE DU LYDIA FINDEST[/u][/b][/size]

[color=#999999]If you don 't know where to find Lydia, first of all: Welcome to the game!! [/color]
[color=#999999]You will stumbel upon her by helping the jarl of WHITERUN defeating the dragon. 

[/color]Wenn Du Lydia noch nicht kennst, zunächst einmal: Herzlich willkommen zu Skyrim!
Du stolperst über Lydia, wenn du für den Jarl von Weißlauf arbeitest und mit Irileth zusammen
Deinen 1. Drachen tötest.

[color=#666666]_________________________________________________________________________
[/color]

[color=#999999][b][size=6][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]Finde out [/font][/size][/b][/color][b][size=6][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]about a new project, i 'm
involved in [b][size=6]and travel to Atmora!
